# Case css-modules: Step 1

## Changed Files
- index.module.css

## Asset Files
- Bundle: bundle.js
- Manifest: main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json, size: 28
- Update: main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 381

## Manifest

### main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json

```json
{"c":["main"],"r":[],"m":[]}
```

		
## Update


### main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js

#### Changed Modules
- ./index.module.css

#### Changed Runtime Modules
- webpack/runtime/get_full_hash

#### Changed Content
```js
"use strict";
self["webpackHotUpdate"]('main', {
"./index.module.css": (function (module, __unused_webpack_exports, __webpack_require__) {
__webpack_require__.r(module.exports = {
  "a": "-_index_module_css-a",
});
}),

},function(__webpack_require__) {
// webpack/runtime/get_full_hash
(() => {
__webpack_require__.h = function () {
	return "CURRENT_HASH";
};

})();

}
);
```
